weekNotes.cookingSchedule: Main batch cooking: Sunday (ground beef soup, rice). Mid-week: None needed. Daily: Microwave assembly only
weekNotes.shoppingSchedule: Trip #1: Saturday or Sunday (Costco/TJ's/WF).\nTrip #2: Tuesday (WF rotisserie chicken on sale)

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs + Carrots + Rice
meals.prepInstructions: Steam carrots in microwave with 3-4 tbsp water, covered (5-6 min). Scramble eggs + egg whites in separate bowl with butter: microwave 1.5 min, stir, then 30-sec intervals until set (total ~2 min). Reheat rice if pre-cooked (1 min). Serve eggs with carrots, rice, and sliced avocado. Season with salt and pepper.
meals.notes: This is what you ate today - worked well for satiety

meals.name: Apple + Almond Butter
meals.prepInstructions: Slice apple. Dip in or spread with almond butter.

meals.name: Ground Beef + Green Beans + Rice
ingredients: Garlic powder, ginger powder, salt, pepper
meals.prepInstructions: Steam frozen green beans in microwave with 3-4 tbsp water, covered (4-5 min). Keep water if you like veggie broth. Reheat ground beef (1-2 min). Reheat rice (1 min). Combine beef, green beans, rice in bowl. Add oil, seasonings. Optional: Add Tajin and drink veggie broth.

meals.name: Cottage Cheese + Berries
meals.prepInstructions: Scoop cottage cheese, top with berries and cinnamon.
meals.notes: Only if genuinely hungry - 14g protein, very filling

days.batchCookingNotes: Batch cook today: (1) Beef & Tomato Soup - brown 1.5-2 lbs ground beef, add 28 oz diced tomatoes + 2-3 cups broth + spices, simmer 30 min, makes 4-5 servings. (2) Cook rice - 2 cups dry jasmine rice = 6 cups cooked, store in fridge for week. (3) Optional: make chia pudding tonight for Monday snack.

meals.name: Tuna Salad Bowl with Rice
meals.prepInstructions: Arrange greens in bowl. Drain tuna well and flake on top. Add cucumber slices. Add rice on side or mixed in. Drizzle with EVOO and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

meals.name: Warm Apple-Cinnamon Oats
meals.prepInstructions: Combine oats and water in bowl. Microwave 2-3 min. Stir in diced apple, microwave 30 sec more. Top with cinnamon and stir in almond butter.

meals.name: Baked Cod + Asparagus + Rice
meals.prepInstructions: OVEN METHOD: Preheat to 400Â°F (200Â°C). Place frozen cod on baking sheet. Dot with butter, squeeze lemon juice, sprinkle zest, dill, garlic powder, salt, pepper. Add asparagus/zucchini to sheet, drizzle with EVOO. Bake 12-15 min until fish flakes. MICROWAVE METHOD: Place cod in dish with butter, lemon, seasonings. Cover with vented lid. Microwave 5-6 min. Steam asparagus/zucchini separately (3-4 min). Serve fish with vegetables and reheated rice.
meals.notes: Omega-3s from cod support anti-inflammatory goals

meals.name: Peppermint tea
meals.prepInstructions: Brew peppermint tea. Sip slowly - supports digestion and reduces gas.

meals.name: Beef & Tomato Soup with Rice
ingredients: 1/2 cup (90g) cooked jasmine rice (mixed in or on side)
2 tbsp (30g) plain Greek yogurt or Trimona yogurt (dollop on top)
Chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika (in soup)
meals.prepInstructions: Reheat beef soup in bowl (2-3 min). Add rice directly to soup or serve on side. Top with yogurt dollop. Optional: grate fresh ginger on top. Stir and enjoy.
meals.notes: From Sunday batch. Soup has depth of flavor with tomatoes + spices + broth

meals.name: Chia Pudding
meals.prepInstructions: If made Sunday night: eat cold from fridge. Top with cinnamon and berries if desired. If making now: mix chia + water + cinnamon, let sit 10 min, stir again.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs + Carrots + Rice
meals.prepInstructions: Steam carrots with water, covered (5-6 min). Scramble eggs in bowl with butter: microwave 1.5 min, stir, 30-sec intervals until set. Reheat rice (1 min). Serve together with sliced avocado. Season.
meals.notes: Simple, satisfying, repeat of what worked Saturday

meals.name: Peppermint tea + almonds
meals.prepInstructions: Brew tea. Serve with almonds only if genuinely hungry (not stress eating).
meals.notes: Check HALT first - stress eating vs real hunger?

days.reminder: ðŸ›’ Pick up rotisserie chicken from Whole Foods today (on sale)!

meals.name: Leftover Beef & Tomato Soup with Rice
meals.prepInstructions: Reheat soup (2-3 min). Add rice. Top with yogurt and optional ginger.

meals.name: Cottage Cheese + Berries
meals.prepInstructions: Top cottage cheese with berries and cinnamon.

meals.name: Ground Beef + Carrots + Rice Bowl
ingredients: Salt, pepper, optional: Tajin or garlic powder
meals.prepInstructions: Steam carrots with water, covered (5-6 min). Reheat beef (1-2 min). Reheat rice (1 min). Combine in bowl with sliced avocado. Drizzle EVOO, season with salt, pepper, optional Tajin.

meals.name: Peppermint tea
meals.prepInstructions: Brew and sip slowly.

meals.name: Rotisserie Chicken + Carrots + Rice
meals.prepInstructions: Shred white meat from rotisserie chicken. Steam carrots with water, covered (5-6 min). Reheat rice (1 min). Combine chicken, carrots, rice in bowl with sliced avocado. Drizzle EVOO and lemon juice. Season. Optional: grate ginger on top.
meals.notes: Tuesday's chicken makes this super easy

meals.name: Apple + Almond Butter
meals.prepInstructions: Slice apple, dip in almond butter.

meals.name: Chicken 'Soup' Bowl (No Bone Broth Version)
ingredients: 1.5 cups (360ml) chicken or vegetable broth (NOT bone broth)
meals.prepInstructions: STOVETOP: Heat regular chicken/vegetable broth in pot with grated ginger + turmeric. Add carrots (pre-steamed or cook in broth 5 min). Add shredded chicken, heat through. Serve over rice. MICROWAVE: Combine shredded chicken + carrots + broth + ginger + turmeric in large bowl. Microwave 3-4 min until hot. Serve over rice.
meals.notes: Regular broth (not bone broth) - still has depth with ginger and turmeric

meals.name: Peppermint tea + almonds
meals.prepInstructions: Brew tea. Eat almonds only if genuinely hungry (not stress eating).

meals.name: Tuna + Green Beans + Rice Bowl
meals.prepInstructions: Steam frozen green beans with water, covered (4-5 min). Drain tuna well. Reheat rice (1 min). Combine tuna, green beans, rice in bowl. Drizzle EVOO and lemon juice. Season. Add cucumber slices if desired.

meals.name: Cottage Cheese + Berries
meals.prepInstructions: Top cottage cheese with berries and cinnamon.

meals.name: Rotisserie Chicken + Green Beans + Rice
meals.prepInstructions: Steam green beans with water, covered (4-5 min). Shred chicken. Reheat rice (1 min). Combine chicken, green beans, rice in bowl with sliced avocado. Drizzle EVOO, season with garlic powder, salt, pepper.

meals.name: Peppermint tea
meals.prepInstructions: Brew and enjoy.

meals.name: Leftover Beef & Tomato Soup (Last Serving)
meals.prepInstructions: Reheat soup (2-3 min). Add rice. Top with yogurt and optional ginger.

meals.name: Warm Apple-Cinnamon Oats
meals.prepInstructions: Microwave oats + water 2-3 min. Stir in diced apple, microwave 30 sec. Top with cinnamon and almond butter.

meals.name: Baked Cod + Carrots + Rice
ingredients: Lemon juice, dill, garlic powder, salt, pepper
meals.prepInstructions: OVEN: Preheat to 400Â°F. Place cod on sheet with butter, lemon, dill, seasonings. Bake 12-15 min. Steam carrots separately. MICROWAVE: Place cod in dish with butter and seasonings. Cover, microwave 5-6 min. Steam carrots separately (5-6 min). Serve with reheated rice.
meals.notes: End week with omega-3s and anti-inflammatory foods

meals.name: Peppermint tea + optional almonds
meals.prepInstructions: Brew tea. Add almonds only if genuinely hungry.
meals.notes: Check in with body - stress eating or real hunger?

emergencySatietyOptions: 1/2 cup cottage cheese (80 cal, 14g P) - BEST for real hunger
1/2 cup edamame (95 cal, 9g P) - add back gradually if tolerated
Apple slices + 1 tbsp almond butter (130 cal, 3g P)
IQ Protein Bar (190 cal, 15g P) - only if genuinely hungry, not stress eating
Orgain shake with pumpkin/apple (200 cal, 22g P)
